ArchiveState.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACTIVE | PENDING_DELETION  
Update requires: No interruption

RetentionPeriod.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: THREE_MONTHS | SIX_MONTHS | NINE_MONTHS | ONE_YEAR | EIGHTEEN_MONTHS | TWO_YEARS | THIRTY_MONTHS | THREE_YEARS | FOUR_YEARS | FIVE_YEARS | SIX_YEARS | SEVEN_YEARS | EIGHT_YEARS | NINE_YEARS | TEN_YEARS | PERMANENT  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9/_\+=\.:@\-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9/_\+=\.:@\-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ArchiveArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

ArchiveId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 66  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

ArchiveName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9_-]*[a-zA-Z0-9]$  
Update requires: No interruption

KmsKeyArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(|-cn|-us-gov):kms:[a-z0-9-]{1,20}:[0-9]{12}:(key|alias)/.+$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

ArchiveId.markdownDescription:
---

Update requires: No interruption
